function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Buildings as a vector for contagious diseases transmission","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread and outbreaks in indoor spaces","Mitigation":"Improving ventilation systems, implementing air filtration, and promoting regular cleaning and disinfection protocols","Technologies":"Advanced HVAC systems, air purifiers, and disinfection technologies","People":"Occupants of indoor spaces, including homes, schools, and offices","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, and public health authorities"},{"Description":"Lack of common standards for building design to support health","Impact":"Inability to assess and ensure the health-supportive nature of buildings","Mitigation":"Establishing common standards and frameworks focused on occupant health, rather than just the building structure","Technologies":"Health-focused building assessment tools and rating systems","People":"Building scientists, architects, and health professionals","Owner":"Organizations involved in building design and construction"},{"Description":"Lack of interdisciplinary approach to understanding health implications of buildings","Impact":"Limited ability to comprehensively address the health consequences of building design, construction, and operation","Mitigation":"Promoting interdisciplinary collaboration between building scientists, architects, health professionals, data scientists, and engineers","Technologies":"Data analytics, building simulation software, and collaboration platforms","People":"Building scientists, architects, health professionals, data scientists, and engineers","Owner":"Research institutions, building industry organizations"}]}
